ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Soloing bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Just gotta throw in my opinion here.  If I had waited to find balanced groups, I would never have gotten to 53.  I have made a considerable portion of my 53
ygData.messageBody:
Just gotta throw in my opinion here. If I had waited to find balanced
groups, I would
never have gotten to 53. I have made a considerable portion of my 53
levels with just a
warrior at my side. We welcome others to group with us without regard for
class because
for the most part we don't need any specific class. I really get annoyed
at the "we have
to have a healer" types. I am the first to admit that I am a cleric junkie
but with careful
planning, (and more careful pulling), our healing songs, and a stack of
band aids we are usually fine.

While I am posting, I might as well get screamed at for this
observation. With any healer
type other than a cleric, I can heal the party up faster than they can heal
us and then med
up enough mana to be ready to go again. At first I marked it up to a bad
player but as I have
partied with more folks, this observation still holds true. Scream away at
me, tell me that
I am crazy. No worries from me.

Pol


>i find it too hard to wait around for a balanced group, so i grab whoever
>happens to
>be around and drag em off to sebilis. well actually most of the time i
>just live in
>sebilis and pick up whoever happens to be hanging around the zonein. so
>we usually
>have at least on hole in the group, sometimes more, heh.
